about_the_game:
The DYE Original Soundtrack by Danny Stracener features 18 tracks (55:17) of music created exclusively for the game.

256kbps MP3 and FLAC files will be placed under: ...Steam\steamapps\common\DYE\Soundtrack

Track Listing

  • 01 - Hearts [01:42]
  • 02 - Emerald [03:18]
  • 03 - Jasmine [04:44]
  • 04 - Indigo [03:55]

  • 07 - Cobalt [03:42]
  • 08 - Silver [03:15]
  • 09 - Vines [02:18]
  • 10 - Coral [02:12]
  • 11 - Apricot [02:43]
  • 12 - Tulip [03:52]
  • 13 - Onyx [01:32]
  • 14 - Mint [03:16]
  • 15 - Thistle [03:54]
  • 16 - Orchid [02:31]
  • 17 - Ivy [03:54]
  • 18 - Chromatic [01:20]
